text: Georg Niermann (born 8 March 1937) is a West German rower who represented the United Team of Germany. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome with the men's coxless four where they were eliminated in the round one repêchage. In 1958 he was rewarded with the Silbernes Lorbeerblatt.Report by the Federal Government of Germany to the Bundestag (German Parliament) from 9/26. 1958 – Report Nr. 7/1040 page 74 - ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:West German male rowers Category:Recipients of the Silver Laurel Leaf Category:Olympic rowers of the United Team of Germany Category:Rowers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Bremen Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Georg Niermann
